Save Records as PDF [ Append ; With dialog: Off ; Create folders: On ]
Save Records as PDF [ Append ; With dialog: Off ; “$filepath” ; Records being browsed ; Create folders: On ]

Save Records as PDF [ Restore ; With dialog: On ; Records being browsed ; Create folders: Off ]
Save Records as PDF [ Restore ; With dialog: On ; Current record ; Create folders: Off ]
